overview: Sudhir Kulkarni is Chief Technical Officer at Sellpoint. Sudhir brings more than 20 years of experience in evangelizing and delivering state-of-the-art software solutions in diverse disciplines such as internet applications, middle-ware, and system management tools. Sudhir possesses significant expertise in developing and delivering SaaS applications and managing 24x7 network operations. Most recently, Sudhir served as Vice-President of Engineering for LiveVox, where he managed 24x7 data-centers and a team of software engineers across the US, Canada, and Banaglore, India. Previously, Sudhir was Managing Director of Informatica India, where he was responsible for delivering products and services through the development and integration of leading-edge technologies. Sudhir was also Vice-President of Engineering at Certive, Inc., and also led engineering teams at BMC and Oracle. Sudhir earned his Master’s Degree from the Indian Institute of Technology at Chennai, and his Bachelor of Science degree from the Regional Engineering College in Warangal, India.
